short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically saves form field data as you type, including text, checkboxes, dates, and images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Form Saver automatically preserves everything you type into online forms, protecting you from losing hours of work if your browser crashes or you accidentally close a tab. Whether you're filling out job applications, writing long surveys, or completing important web forms, this extension ensures your progress is always saved. Install Form Saver to never lose your form data again.
